name: Shape in the wall
description:
IMPORTANT - the WebGL build (above) is experimental and may be very laggy, download the game for your OS for the best experience :)


Created for Ludum Dare 35

You control the shape of the hole in the wall you're approaching, get through as many as you can!

CONTROLS
1 - Cube hole
2 - Sphere hole
3 - Cone hole
4 - Cylinder hole
space - Start/Restart
esc - Exit
